posts.post_content:
Trying to pay off medical debt by the end of the month. Here is a list of a few items for sale. I will also trade. PayPal F/F or Money Orders please. Ask for any scans!

Thanks for looking!
Mark

PM or email (mark.anderson.10000@tx.rr.com)
